thread.title: Mr World to debut in Marathi film
thread.title_full: Mr World to debut in Marathi film - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Mr World to debut in Marathi film
text:
Last year he won the 2014 Mr World Bodybuilding award and this year Sangram Chougule is all set to make his acting debut through the forthcoming Marathi film 'Dambha', which is being written and directed by Prasad Appa Tarkar, reports a website.
READ: Marathi film goes international
Giving details about the bodybuilders Marathi debut, marathimovieworld.com said, "According to the makers, this will be an action packed film and Sangram Chougule finds a suitable role as the lead hero of this film. The actual shooting of this film will begin next month."
On the poster of this film, Sangram takes the look of Hollywood actor Dwayne Johnson. The action director of this film will be Peter Hein, while DOP will be Shailesh Awasthi.
WATCH: Sangram's winning performance at Mr World
